doc.previous: A planned bomber training version of the T-29 (designated T-32) was never built. The CV-340 model was used for most C-131Ds.[citation needed]
doc.after: In addition to T-29 variants, the United States Navy used the Samaritan, initially designated as the R4Y until 1962, at which point the naval aircraft were also redesignated as C-131s.[citation needed]
